name: Microsoft Teams
description: This app integrates with Microsoft Teams to support various generic and investigative actions

scope.default: offline_access calendars.readwrite onlinemeetings.readwrite channelmessage.send user.readbasic.all channel.readbasic.all groupmember.read.all

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
actions.verbose: You first need admin consent if you're a non-admin user.

actions.description: Get the admin consent for a non-admin user
actions.verbose: Action 'get admin consent' has to be run by an admin user to provide consent to a non-admin user.

actions.description: Send a message to a channel of a group
Lists all channels of a group

actions.verbose: The add_calendar_event parameter can be used for creating a calender event for the given time and send the meeting invitation to all the attendees. If the value of that parameter is false, then apart from subject, rest of the parameters will be ignored and no event will be created in the calendar.

add_calendar_event.description: Create a calendar event for the meeting or not

start_time.description: Date and Time to start the meeting

end_time.description: Date and Time to end the meeting

attendees.description: Email-id of the users to send the meeting invitation
